snippet: Errors and procedures that may be wasting precious time during emergencies in New York City are highlighted in a highly anticipated report from a consulting company.
abstract: Bloomberg administration releases final version of report on its much-delayed and over-budget new 911 system after controversial efforts at blocking an early draft; study highlights errors and procedures that may slow system's response times.
lead_paragraph: Errors and procedures that may be wasting precious time during emergencies in New York City are highlighted in a highly anticipated report from a consulting company.

headline.seo: Report Lists Flaws in Handling of 911 Calls
headline.main: Report Lists Many Flaws in Handling of 911 Calls
headline.print_headline: Report Lists Many Flaws In Handling Of 911 Calls
